translation.ja: よく聞いてくださいよ

translation.en: In September 1983,
someone will be challenging the Americans for the America's Cup,
translation.ja: アメリカス･カップに挑もうとする男がいます

translation.en: and this man will be skipper.
translation.ja: スキッパーのジョン･バートランドに

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, would you please welcome John Bertrand?
translation.ja: スキッパーのジョン･バートランドに 大きな拍手を

translation.en: [Bertrand] Deep down,
translation.ja: 私は確信していた

translation.en: I knew if there's anyone that can actually take on Dennis Conner,
translation.ja: 私は確信していた デニス･コナーと渡り合えるとしたら⸺

translation.en: it was someone like myself.
translation.ja: それは私だ

translation.en: [host] How long have you been sailing?
translation.ja: セーリングはいつから？

translation.en: I started when I was 12 years old.
translation.ja: 12歳からです

translation.en: -[host] What type or class of yacht? -Little Sabots, little trainers.
translation.ja: ヨットは？ 小型のサボ

translation.en: [host] Yeah?
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: [Bertrand] My great-grandfather was involved in the construction of three America's Cup boats.
translation.ja: 曾祖父は過去３度の大会で艇の建造に関わった

translation.en: My grandfather was a professional fisherman,
translation.ja: 漁師だった祖父は⸺

translation.en: and he'd teach me when the sea breeze would come in.
translation.ja: 海風が吹くタイミングを私に教えてくれた

translation.en: He'd have this intuitive sixth sense that was passed on to myself.
translation.ja: 祖父の持つ第６感は私に受け継がれていた

translation.en: [host] No makeup. Is that what you get from life on the ocean waves?
translation.ja: メイクではなく海で日焼けした？

translation.en: It's hours in the sun, Ian.
translation.ja: 太陽の下にいる

translation.en: Hours and hours. Is this a hard life?
translation.ja: 何時間もだねつらくはない？

translation.en: [Bertrand] But when I was 15, there was a shock to our family.
translation.ja: 私が15歳の時家族に不幸が続いた

translation.en: My father died, my grandfather died,
translation.ja: 父と祖父が亡くなり⸺

translation.en: and then my great-grandfather died, in sequence.
translation.ja: 曾祖父の死が続いた

translation.en: So we lost all the men.
translation.ja: 男は皆 死んだ

translation.en: [woman] When John's father passed away, there was a call in him.
translation.ja: 父親が亡くなったことでジョンは本気になった

translation.en: It, in fact, was what has always driven him.
translation.ja: でも実は 前から彼が望んでいたことだった

translation.en: But what I really understood about John was his ability to really focus.
translation.ja: ジョンについて一番 言えることは ものすごい集中力の持ち主ということね ものすごい集中力の持ち主ということね ラサ･バートランドジョンの妻 ものすごい集中力の持ち主ということね

translation.en: He could totally shut off.
translation.ja: 外の世界を遮断してしまう

translation.en: I was infatuated with winning the America's Cup and what was required.
translation.ja: アメリカ杯の優勝とその準備に執着していった

translation.en: Hopefully, you'll be the one to challenge whatever yacht the Americans put up.
translation.ja: アメリカの艇が何であれ挑戦してほしい

translation.en: That's right. Dennis Conner is the skipper of the one boat,
translation.ja: デニスがスキッパーとして乗った艇が

translation.en: which he successfully defended last time.
translation.ja: 前回は防衛に成功した

translation.en: -Didn't like him much. -[audience laughs]
translation.ja: 彼は嫌だな

translation.en: [Bertrand] Every year losing to Dennis,
translation.ja: デニスに負けたのは

translation.en: I concluded that I wasn't mentally tough enough.
translation.ja: メンタルの強さが足りなかったからだ

translation.en: And unless you understood your competition,
translation.ja: 自分が挑む競技を理解し

translation.en: unless you understood the enemy, you could never actually take it to another level.
translation.ja: 敵を見極めなければ次のレベルに進めない

translation.en: So I got a scholarship to MIT in Boston
translation.ja: 私はＭＩＴの奨学生となり海洋工学を学んで

translation.en: in the Department of Ocean Engineering to become part of the US system.
translation.ja: 私はＭＩＴの奨学生となり海洋工学を学んで 私はＭＩＴの奨学生となり海洋工学を学んで マサチューセッツ(ＭＩＴ)工科大学 マサチューセッツ(ＭＩＴ)工科大学 マサチューセッツ(ＭＩＴ)工科大学 アメリカに入り込んだ アメリカに入り込んだ

translation.en: [man] During this program, you'll be training for careers in marine engineering.
translation.ja: 海洋工学の職業訓練プログラムです

translation.en: There will be lab work, sea projects, and plenty of difficult classwork.
translation.ja: 研究から海洋プロジェクト実地訓練もあります

translation.en: [Rasa] When he told me the name of his thesis,
translation.ja: 論文のテーマを聞いた時 論文のテーマを聞いた時 〝終了〞

translation.en: I think, by then, I really understood
translation.ja: 〝終了〞 私には分かっていた 私には分かっていた

translation.en: how important sailing was to him.
translation.ja: 彼がセーリングを大事に思う気持ちがね

translation.en: Optimum Angle of Attack of America's Cup Sails.
translation.ja: “アメリカ杯における最適な迎角”

translation.en: Using lifting-line theory, aerospace engineering,
translation.ja: 揚力の理論と航空宇宙工学

translation.en: highly technical control systems,
translation.ja: 操縦系統の高度なシステム

translation.en: basically torpedoes.
translation.ja: 魚雷の要領だ

translation.en: I was behind enemy lines for months…
translation.ja: 敵地で何ヵ月も過ごした

translation.en: learning about secrets.
translation.ja: 勝利の秘けつを学び

translation.en: That was very applicable to the America's Cup challenge.
translation.ja: アメリカス･カップの挑戦に役立てる

translation.en: So, after MIT, I knew enough
translation.ja: ＭＩＴに通って⸺ 世界一のチームと互角に戦うための知識を得た

translation.en: that we could go head-to-head, toe-to-toe with the best in the world.
translation.ja: 世界一のチームと互角に戦うための知識を得た

translation.en: [man] Come on, Kyle.
translation.ja: アメリカの合宿アメリカ杯の17ヵ月前

translation.en: [Conner] To compete, you have to have the money. I just said,
translation.ja: 挑戦するにはカネが要る

translation.en: "When you want to race the America's Cup, show me the money."
translation.ja: アメリカ杯に出たいなら資金力を証明しろ

translation.en: I guess it's fair to say that estimates about how much money has been spent to win this baby
translation.ja: この宝を手にするための費用を知るべきでしょう

translation.en: are anywhere between 60 and maybe 100 million dollars.
translation.ja: 6000万ドルから１億ドルほどです

translation.en: [Conner] I was lucky. I had the backing of the New York Yacht Club.
translation.ja: 幸運なことに 私にはＮＹＹＣの後ろ盾があった

translation.en: I loved them like Mom and Dad.
translation.ja: 両親のように慕った

translation.en: So you get the money, then you can start to put a team together.
translation.ja: お金を手に入れたら次はクルーを集める

translation.en: [reporter] Conner is putting his troops through a training program
translation.ja: コナーは彼の部隊に これまで以上の厳しいトレーニングを課した

translation.en: as tough as any yet devised for an America's Cup campaign.
translation.ja: これまで以上の厳しいトレーニングを課した

translation.en: [Conner] It's important that the crew be able to perform at their best,
translation.ja: クルーの力を最大限 引き出すために

translation.en: and to do so, they have to have a full commitment,
translation.ja: 彼らに全力を尽くしてもらう

translation.en: working 5:00 in the morning till 9:00 at night, six days a week for 17 months.
translation.ja: 朝５時から夜９時まで週に６日 17ヵ月訓練する

translation.en: So the more money, you can start to invest in technology.
translation.ja: さらにお金があれば技術に投資もできる

translation.en: Then you can start thinking about, "What kind of a designer are we going to have?"
translation.ja: まず考えるのは“デザインを誰に頼むか”

translation.en: "Who's gonna build the boat? Who's gonna make the sails?"
translation.ja: “誰に艇やセールを作ってもらうか”

translation.en: [host] The New York Yacht Club calls to order the first meeting…
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣの最初の会議を招集します

translation.en: [Bertrand] Studying the New York Yacht Club,
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣを知るほど思い知らされた

translation.en: I realize if we're ever to win this thing,
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣを知るほど思い知らされた 大会で勝つためにはお金が要る

translation.en: we would need money, lots of money.
translation.ja: 大会で勝つためにはお金が要る 大金がね

translation.en: [reporter] The story of the America's challenge
translation.ja: アラン･ボンドヨットチームのオーナー アメリカへの挑戦物語は

translation.en: is the story of the whole Bond financial saga.
translation.ja: アラン･ボンドヨットチームのオーナー ボンドの資産の伝説でもあります ボンドの資産の伝説でもあります

translation.en: Bondy has always been a gambler,
translation.ja: ボンドは勝負師であり

translation.en: and that's what this is all about, money.
translation.ja: 彼にとってはお金が全てです

translation.en: [Bertrand] Alan was the syndicate chairman for Australia.
translation.ja: アランはシンジケートの会長として

translation.en: He took a gamble.
translation.ja: 賭けに出た

translation.en: It was his money. It was his project.
translation.ja: これは彼のお金で彼のプロジェクトだ

translation.en: [Simmer] Bondy was a big risk-taker. Larger than life.
translation.ja: ボンドは人生よりもリスクを取る男で

translation.en: He'd made a lot of money in a short amount of time,
translation.ja: 短期間に大金を稼いだ

translation.en: largely through property deals.
translation.ja: メインは不動産取引だが醸造所も買った

translation.en: And he bought Swan Brewery.
translation.ja: メインは不動産取引だが醸造所も買った 〝スワン〞

translation.en: But from the New York Yacht Club's point of view, he wasn't real wealth.
translation.ja: だが ＮＹＹＣから見ればまだ資産家とは言えない

translation.en: [Bertrand] Alan intuitively knew
translation.ja: アランは直感した

translation.en: to win could take him from a local trader to a global trader.
translation.ja: 大会で勝てば世界の実業家になれると

translation.en: It was power and influence, and that was his motivation.
translation.ja: その力への欲求が彼の強い動機だった

translation.en: [Bertrand] So, I said to Alan, "There's basically three elements in this competition."
translation.ja: 私はアランに 大会に必要な３つの要素を伝えた

translation.en: "You gotta have world-class administration."
translation.ja: 世界レベルの組織

translation.en: "You gotta have world-class technology,
translation.ja: 世界レベルの技術力

translation.en: and, ultimately, the team has to be world-class."
translation.ja: そして世界レベルのチームだ

translation.en: We needed to get brilliant, highly sophisticated minds.
translation.ja: 聡明で教養のある人材が必要だったので

translation.en: Invite the best of the best.
translation.ja: 最高の人選をした

translation.en: So I called Huey.
translation.ja: ヒューに声をかけた

translation.en: [Treharne] Got an apprenticeship and I left school as a sailmaker.
translation.ja: ヒュー･トレハーンタクティシャン セール製作を学んでいたので セール製作を学んでいたので

translation.en: I can see wind shifts and wind pressure. Just could almost smell the wind.
translation.ja: 風のにおいを嗅げば風向きの変化や風圧が分かる

translation.en: [reporter] …and outstanding tactician Hugh Treharne
translation.ja: 優秀な戦術家ヒュー･トレハーンが

translation.en: join other senior members of the Australian team.
translation.ja: 優秀な戦術家ヒュー･トレハーンが チームに入りました

translation.en: Is this the year of the impossible?
translation.ja: 今年こそ悲願達成なるか？

translation.en: I was working as an engineer on a uranium mine.
translation.ja: 私はウラン鉱山のエンジニアだった ナビゲーター 私はウラン鉱山のエンジニアだった

translation.en: I was actually a school teacher at the time.
translation.ja: グラインダー 学校の先生だった

translation.en: I was working as an electrical engineer.
translation.ja: 電気技師をしていた 電気技師をしていた トリマー

translation.en: And I get a phone call out of the blue saying,
translation.ja: 突然 電話が来てこう言われた

translation.en: "I'd like you to be the navigator on this 12 Metre we're gonna build for the next America's Cup."
translation.ja: “次のアメリカス･カップでナビゲーターをしてほしい”

translation.en: I hadn't been a navigator on any boat.
translation.ja: 艇のナビゲーターは初めてだったが

translation.en: He said, "You're an engineer. You go and figure it out."
translation.ja: “エンジニアならできる”と言われたよ

translation.en: [Lissiman] John Bertrand very carefully worked out
translation.ja: ジョンは細心の注意を払って

translation.en: the people with the right mental capacity,
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣを出し抜けるような知的能力の高い人を選んだ

translation.en: who could outsmart the New York Yacht Club.
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣを出し抜けるような知的能力の高い人を選んだ ＮＹＹＣを出し抜けるような知的能力の高い人を選んだ トリマー

translation.en: [Bertrand] To take on the power of the American psyche, with their immense confidence,
translation.ja: アメリカの強い精神力と大きな自信に挑むには

translation.en: you need a strong ego to be able to play that game, and that was a major hurdle.
translation.ja: 強い自尊心が必要でありそれが最も大きな課題だった

translation.en: [Bertrand] In our country, in Australia, we have this thing called the Tall Poppy Syndrome,
translation.ja: オーストラリアにはトールポピー症候群といって

translation.en: where people start to show a sense of confidence, and they cut you down.
translation.ja: 〝トールポピー症候群〞 “出る杭は打たれる”という考え方がある “出る杭は打たれる”という考え方がある

translation.en: So, if I could get the mental side tough enough,
translation.ja: クルーのメンタルを鍛えれば

translation.en: then perhaps I could put the whole thing together.
translation.ja: チームがまとまると考えた

translation.en: [Lissiman] Bertrand sent this psych test out to all of the potential crew members.
translation.ja: ジョンはクルー候補に心理テストを受けさせた

translation.en: And I can remember getting this 14-page psych test
translation.ja: 今も覚えてるが14ページもあるテストで

translation.en: and thinking, "What is this crap?"
translation.ja: “何だこれは？”と思った

translation.en: Yeah. I did the personality test. [laughs]
translation.ja: 性格診断テストをしたよ

translation.en: The assessment was that I could have more confidence.
translation.ja: 結果が出て 評価表には

translation.en: That was the assessment, yeah, that I could have more confidence.
translation.ja: “もっと自信を持て”と書いてあった

translation.en: So for us, we had to believe ourselves that we belong on the world stage.
translation.ja: 私たちに必要なのは 世界の舞台に立てると自分を信じることだ

translation.en: That's the power of visualization.
translation.ja: それがイメージの効力だ

translation.en: See the sails, see fellow crew members,
translation.ja: セールを見上げ仲間のクルーを見る

translation.en: realize the trust, faith, and respect you have for them.
translation.ja: 彼らへの信頼や忠誠敬意を感じて…

translation.en: You're visualizing the environment even before you've gone into battle.
translation.ja: 戦いに出る前に状況を頭でイメージする

translation.en: Ultimately, training the mind not to be intimidated in that environment.
translation.ja: 心を鍛えることで どんな状況にも怖気づかなくなる

translation.en: [man] Listen to the helicopters above.
translation.ja: ヘリコプターの音が聞こえ

translation.en: -[helicopter blades whirring] -[man] You see the US Coast Guard.
translation.ja: 沿岸警備隊が見える

translation.en: We're all working hand in hand together as a team.
translation.ja: チームが一丸となって操船している

translation.en: And then you see Dennis Conner…
translation.ja: デニス･コナーが⸺

translation.en: and his American boat, Liberty.
translation.ja: リバティ号に乗っている

translation.en: [Bertrand] And finally,
translation.ja: いよいよ最後に用意するのは

translation.en: the last thing we had to have was the high-tech, world-class boat.
translation.ja: いよいよ最後に用意するのは 最新技術の世界レベルの艇だ

translation.en: But the American sailing technology was at a much higher level
translation.ja: アメリカの造船技術はオーストラリアよりも

translation.en: than anything we had in Australia.
translation.ja: はるかに上回っていた

translation.en: [reporter] The battle of the Cup has become a war of technology,
translation.ja: １９８２年アメリカ杯の13ヵ月前 近年のカップ防衛戦は技術戦争です 近年のカップ防衛戦は技術戦争です

translation.en: and Conner had wanted to build himself a fearsome weapon.
translation.ja: コナーも自らの武器の製造に乗り出し コナーも自らの武器の製造に乗り出し アメリカ艇　リバティ

translation.en: So he went to the heavily-guarded US Government weapons research center.
translation.ja: アメリカ艇　リバティ 厳重に警備された政府の武器研究所を訪れます 厳重に警備された政府の武器研究所を訪れます

translation.en: [Conner] Right now we have naval architects involved.
translation.ja: 軍艦の設計者に協力してもらっている

translation.en: As a matter of fact, we have, at the hub of our campaign, basically a subcontractor from the Department of Defense.
translation.ja: 今のキャンペーンの中心は国防総省の下請け会社だ

translation.en: Dennis had US Navy and aerospace technology.
translation.ja: デニスは海軍と航空宇宙工学を味方につけた

translation.en: [Simmer] And he had big design teams, like nearly 30 guys,
translation.ja: 彼には30人ほどのデザインチームがいたが

translation.en: but those days we just had Benny.
translation.ja: 当時の我々にはベンしかいない

translation.en: We had Benny. That was it.
translation.ja: ベン独りだった

translation.en: [reporter] Seen here is the barefoot Australian, Ben Lexcen.
translation.ja: 裸足のオーストラリア人ベン･レクセンは

translation.en: He's Alan Bond's unlikely choice to design his yacht
translation.ja: アラン･ボンド艇のデザイナーには見えません

translation.en: for the upcoming 1983 America's Cup.
translation.ja: 1983年アメリカス･カップの艇です

translation.en: But where many designers live in a world full of calculus and geometry,
translation.ja: 微積法や幾何学の専門家が多い世界ですが

translation.en: Ben Lexcen lives in a world of art.
translation.ja: ベンはアーティストです

translation.en: [Lexcen] Yacht design is still an art.
translation.ja: ヨットは芸術です

translation.en: It's probably one of the only arts left where the artist has to prove his work
translation.ja: アーティストが実力を証明できる⸺ 究極のアートかもしれません

translation.en: by actual performance.
translation.ja: 究極のアートかもしれません

translation.en: Benny was different. He was not constrained in a box.
translation.ja: ベンは独特で考え方が枠にはまらない

translation.en: Brilliant and dangerous in so many ways.
translation.ja: 多くの点で賢いが危険な男だ 多くの点で賢いが危険な男だ ベン･レクセンヨットデザイナー

translation.en: He was the Leonardo da Vinci of Australia.
translation.ja: 我が国のレオナルド･ダ･ヴィンチだ

translation.en: Only three years of formal education, nine years old to twelve years old.
translation.ja: 教育を受けたのは９～12歳までの３年間のみ

translation.en: So he wasn't restricted in his thinking.
translation.ja: だから発想が自由で⸺

translation.en: That was his strength, as it turns out.
translation.ja: それが彼の強みだった

translation.en: [Longley] Ben's one of these really unique people in the world
translation.ja: ベンは世界有数の奇特な人だ

translation.en: who comes from an incredible background of hardly any formal schooling at all.
translation.ja: 経歴を見ても学校教育を ほぼ受けてない

translation.en: He was almost a street person in a way.
translation.ja: 路上生活者のようにも見えた

translation.en: [Rasa] Benny would just arrive
translation.ja: 〝身分証ベン･レクセン〞 〝身分証ベン･レクセン〞 ベンは突然 家に来ては２晩や２週間と滞在していく ベンは突然 家に来ては２晩や２週間と滞在していく

translation.en: and stay with us for two nights, two weeks,
translation.ja: ベンは突然 家に来ては２晩や２週間と滞在していく

translation.en: and he was physically very awkward.
translation.ja: 外見もとても変わっていてチック症状もあった

translation.en: He had a very severe tic, but he was curious.
translation.ja: 外見もとても変わっていてチック症状もあった でも 何にでも興味を持ち

translation.en: He was a passionately curious man.
translation.ja: とても熱心で好奇心旺盛だった

translation.en: And we've moved the rig slightly, so, uh… The boat feels really nice.
translation.ja: リグを少し動かしてみた いい感じだ

translation.en: [Longley] His genius was to be able to absorb information.
translation.ja: 彼は天才で多くの情報を吸収することができる

translation.en: He's like a honeyeater.
translation.ja: ミツスイ鳥のように

translation.en: He'd just pick, pick, pick, pick, pick, pick, pick, pick and bring all this in.
translation.ja: 多くを吸い上げて１つにまとめる

translation.en: [Bertrand] So when Benny started to design the yacht,
translation.ja: ベンはデザインを始めた頃

translation.en: I was sitting on the dock, and he said, "John, look at the seagulls."
translation.ja: 波止場にいた私に“カモメを見ろ”と言った

translation.en: He said, "Every feather, there's a flight control system."
translation.ja: “全ての羽に飛行機能が備わっていて”

translation.en: He said, "There must be a thousand control systems in one wing of that bird."
translation.ja: “1000通りものパターンが１つの翼に宿ってる”

translation.en: He said, "Look at how they take off. It's just one flip and they're gone."
translation.ja: “舞い立つ時の翼のひと振りは⸺”

translation.en: "It's beautiful."
translation.ja: “美しい”

translation.en: He was a student of nature.
translation.ja: 彼の先生は自然だった

translation.en: And I had very little understanding of where it could lead,
translation.ja: 彼の方向性は見えなかったが

translation.en: but the door was opened.
translation.ja: ドアは開かれた

translation.en: [Longley] Benny had gone across to Holland to try and design a 12 Metre
translation.ja: ベンはオランダへ行き 1980年の12メートル級を越える艇を設計しようとした

translation.en: that was gonna be better than the 12 Metre that we had in 1980.
translation.ja: 1980年の12メートル級を越える艇を設計しようとした

translation.en: [Bertrand] Benny was at one of the biggest towing tank facilities in the world
translation.ja: オランダシップ･モデル研究所 ベンは世界有数の水槽施設で ベンは世界有数の水槽施設で

translation.en: trying to get another one hundredth of one knot out of the boat.
translation.ja: ０.01ノットでも速い艇を目指した

translation.en: He was tearing his hair out trying to find an improvement, and he just couldn't.
translation.ja: だが 方法が見つからず焦っていた

translation.en: [Longley] He was enormously frustrated,
translation.ja: 彼はイラ立っていたが

translation.en: and suddenly we started getting these telexes…
translation.ja: ある日 突然テレックスが届いたんだ

translation.en: where he said, "Hang on. We're onto something here."
translation.ja: “画期的な発見だ”と書いてあった

translation.en: Every day we'd get back to the office and there'd be another telex
translation.ja: 毎日 オフィスにテレックスが届き

translation.en: with him getting more and more excited.
translation.ja: 彼はますます興奮していったよ

translation.en: He said, "I'm developing a keel here that could potentially be a breakthrough."
translation.ja: 彼はキールの開発が改良の鍵だと言っていた 彼はキールの開発が改良の鍵だと言っていた〝オーストラリア２号ウィングキール〞

translation.en: But he didn't actually tell us what it was.
translation.ja: 〝ヨットを安定させる〞だが 具体的には何も言わない

translation.en: [reporter] Lexcen's seven models underwent test trials
translation.ja: レクセンは７隻の模型艇のテストを

translation.en: in minute detail in at least 200 runs,
translation.ja: レクセンは７隻の模型艇のテストを 200回以上 行いました

translation.en: which allowed the designer to make constant refinements to his secret keel.
translation.ja: 秘密のキールに改良を重ねていきます

translation.en: [Bertrand] So the call came through to come across to see this model
translation.ja: 電話が来て 奇抜な形のキールを見に来てほしいと言われた

translation.en: that he created with this funny-looking keel.
translation.ja: 奇抜な形のキールを見に来てほしいと言われた

translation.en: [Simmer] So, I knew there was something special going on with the keel.
translation.ja: 特別なキールだと聞いていたが

translation.en: Benny said, "Okay, you can come over, but you can't tell anyone."
translation.ja: 他言しないようにとベンに言われた

translation.en: It was under covers, and John Bertrand took me in to have a look.
translation.ja: ジョンが カバーを取って見せてくれた

translation.en: There, sitting in the foundry on the sand, was this thing.
translation.ja: 鋳造所の砂の上にそれは乗っていた

translation.en: [Brown] And I think I was speechless.
translation.ja: 言葉も出なかったが

translation.en: Just trying to take it all in.
translation.ja: 受け入れようとした

translation.en: I'm looking at this thing going, "You can't be serious."
translation.ja: 実物を見た時“あり得ない”と思ったよ

translation.en: I didn't know what to think because it looked a bit weird.
translation.ja: あまりに奇妙な形で理解できなかった

translation.en: [Longley] People have been designing 12 Metres since 1905.
translation.ja: 12メートル級は1905年から作られているが

translation.en: This is so different.
translation.ja: それと全く違う

translation.en: How can it be right?
translation.ja: これは何だ？

translation.en: I knew that the keel was inverted.
translation.ja: キールがひっくり返ってた

translation.en: It was upside down.
translation.ja: 逆さまなんだ

translation.en: It was like someone designed a new car. Looked like it's got wheels on the roof.
translation.ja: まるでタイヤを車のルーフにつけたみたい

translation.en: It became clear Benny had been playing around with wings.
translation.ja: ベンは翼を作ったのだと徐々に分かってきた

translation.en: It's like a bird with wings on it. Okay?
translation.ja: そう　鳥の翼のようだった

translation.en: And that became the outrageous winged keel.
translation.ja: 翼のキールなんて邪道だ 翼のキールなんて邪道だ 〝ウィングキール〞

translation.en: [Simmer] We knew the boat was high risk.
translation.ja: 〝通常のキール〞このキールはリスクを伴う このキールはリスクを伴う

translation.en: And John, who's technically one of the great sailors,
translation.ja: 優れたセーラーのジョンでさえ

translation.en: was a little nervous about it.
translation.ja: 不安そうだった

translation.en: The last thing I wanted to do is to spend a huge amount of my time, effort, and emotion
translation.ja: 一番避けたいのは膨大な時間や労力を⸺

translation.en: on something where the equipment was never gonna cut it.
translation.ja: 無駄な艤装に費やすことだ

translation.en: We didn't even know it was gonna sail like a yacht.
translation.ja: ヨットとは思えない

translation.en: When I showed our boat, they all thought I'd gone off my rocker.
translation.ja: 彼らに艇を見せた時は異常者扱いされたよ

translation.en: So we decided we were going to have a big meeting with Alan Bond.
translation.ja: そこで アラン･ボンドに相談した

translation.en: "So, Alan, Benny's come up with a boat that is very, very different."
translation.ja: “ベンがデザインした艇はとても変わっている”

translation.en: "But the tank says it's 20 minutes faster around the track than this one."
translation.ja: “だが 技術的には⸺” “20分速く走れるそうだがどうする？”

translation.en: "What are we going to do?" And Alan said, "Right."
translation.ja: “20分速く走れるそうだがどうする？” アランは許可した

translation.en: "Well, we're gonna build that one. Otherwise, you're all fired."
translation.ja: “新しい艇を作らなければ全員クビだ”と

translation.en: So we just went ahead and built that boat.
translation.ja: そして艇の建造を始めた

translation.en: This is where Ben Lexcen's latest winged wonder
translation.ja: レクセンの最新作“翼の謎”が

translation.en: will have its fiery birth in a vat of molten lead in North Fremantle.
translation.ja: ノースフリーマントルで火のたるから誕生します

translation.en: [Simmer] So many years of getting hammered by the Americans.
translation.ja: アメリカ人に何度も惨敗してきたが

translation.en: It was time that we had to do something radical.
translation.ja: 革新的なアイディアで挑む時が来た

translation.en: Skippy and I were involved in building the boat. You know, literally hands-on.
translation.ja: スキップと私は実際に艇の建造を手伝った

translation.en: Everyone was covered in gray from grinding and cutting aluminum.
translation.ja: 削ったアルミニウムで皆 灰色になったよ

translation.en: [Longley] Benny Lexcen and I designed the deck layout together.
translation.ja: 私はベンとデッキの設計をした

translation.en: And I was in charge of everything from the deck up.
translation.ja: 私はデッキより上を担当した

translation.en: We actually threw the rule book out in terms of how sails will be made.
translation.ja: 通常のセールを参考にするのはやめて⸺

translation.en: And we developed the software to design the sails.
translation.ja: 新しいセールを作るソフトウェアを開発した

translation.en: Totally revolutionary.
translation.ja: まさに革命だ

translation.en: [Simmer] We would take risks and broke a lot of stuff
translation.ja: リスクを取って常識を捨てた

translation.en: because Benny was experimenting as he was building stuff.
translation.ja: ベンが作る実験的な艇に合わせてね

translation.en: That's how he was, you know.
translation.ja: 彼はそういう男だ

translation.en: [Bertrand] You'd say, "Well, that guy's crazy."
translation.ja: 彼は確かにイカれてる

translation.en: Well, yes, he was, but we're all crazy. It's all part of the deal.
translation.ja: でも 全員がイカれた考えを持つことが必要だ

translation.en: [reporter 1] We sat down with designer Ben Lexcen
translation.ja: デザイナーのベンに時間をもらい

translation.en: and talked about his partnership with team owner Alan Bond.
translation.ja: オーナーのアランについて話を聞きました

translation.en: [Lexcen] I'm not under any pressure of time or money,
translation.ja: 時間やお金に縛られることはない

translation.en: and he appreciates my style of thinking,
translation.ja: 彼は僕の考えに共感してくれて

translation.en: and he more or less lets me just wander along like I'm an inventor.
translation.ja: 僕を発明家のように扱い自由にさせてくれる

translation.en: Alan Bond's new 12 Metre was officially named in the ceremony
translation.ja: ボンドの新しい艇はパースで進水し

translation.en: before thousands of spectators in Perth today.
translation.ja: 何千人もの観客に披露されました

translation.en: [reporter 2] A supremely confident Alan Bond

translation.en: told a news conference today
translation.ja: アランは自信満々に会見で述べました

translation.en: that Australia II would win the America's Cup.
translation.ja: “この艇でアメリカに勝つ”と

translation.en: The construction of this yacht first began with Ben Lexcen, the designer.
translation.ja: 艇の建造は ベン･レクセンのデザインから始まり

translation.en: We've worked over two years on a truly Australian effort.
translation.ja: 国を挙げて ２年越しで取り組んできました

translation.en: For the first time,
translation.ja: 我々は初めて

translation.en: we have been able to develop equal to anything else the world will see.
translation.ja: 世界に負けない技術を開発したのです

translation.en: [man] Three cheers… Hip-hip hooray!

translation.en: On behalf of AT&T, we're proud to, uh, be a sponsor

translation.en: in defense of the America's Cup.

translation.en: And let me just add one other thing. Go get 'em, Dennis!

translation.en: -[Conner] All right! -[man] Tomorrow!

translation.en: for the most coveted sailing prize, the America's Cup.

translation.en: 52 races against all the other countries,

translation.ja: 〝２位：カナダ１号３位：チャレンジ〞 勝った国が９月にアメリカと対戦する 勝った国が９月にアメリカと対戦する

translation.en: [man] There was a time here in New England

translation.en: when the words "The British are coming" rang out loud and clear.
translation.ja: １９８３年アメリカス･カップ イギリス優勢が騒がれていました

translation.en: But during this summer of 1983 here in Newport, it's not only the British who are coming,

translation.en: but it's also the French, the Canadians, the Italians,

translation.en: and the Australians.

translation.en: so that someone else could copy it, and put it on their boat, and be as competitive as what we were.

translation.en: "These guys have finally lost it." "They've lost three times, and they're getting desperate."

translation.en: That was the attitude of it.
translation.ja: そんな扱いだ

translation.en: Starting leg of the America's Cup course is into the wind,

translation.en: four-and-a-half miles long to this mark, followed by two reaching legs.

translation.en: So we entered the first races of the elimination series against the Italians,

translation.en: with the unknown of just how competitive our package was.
translation.ja: 我々の艇の競争力は未知数だった

translation.en: [Simmer] This radical boat, you're either gonna hit a home run or you're not.
translation.ja: この革新的な艇はホームランとなるだろうか

translation.en: We were either going to be heroes or idiots.
translation.ja: 英雄か大バカ者のどちらかだ

translation.en: -[official] Five, four, three, two, one. -[gun fires]
[announcer 1] Australia has turned the mark and is absolutely flying downwind.
translation.ja: オーストラリアはマークを回り追い風に乗った

translation.en: [Bertrand] All the work that we had done in Australia had paid huge dividends.
translation.ja: 努力してきた全てが成果につながった

translation.en: [announcer 2] Australia II has won.
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号の勝利

translation.en: [announcer 3] You can see Australia II. She's just crossed the finishing line.

translation.en: And we came out all guns blazing.
translation.ja: 全力を出し切った

translation.en: [Longley] We were no longer overawed by Newport.
translation.ja: もう ニューポートに圧倒されない

translation.en: We were just angry. We were there for one reason, to win.
translation.ja: 我々の目的は勝って彼らを見返すことだ

translation.en: The time is 6:30 a.m. on a Sunday morning,
translation.ja: 日曜の早朝６時半から

translation.en: and the Australia II crew is already hard at work.
translation.ja: オーストラリアは練習に励みます

translation.en: [Longley] We would run, we'd do weights, we'd do aerobics.
translation.ja: ランニングや筋トレ体操の目的は⸺

translation.en: It was not only a part of getting fit and getting strong.
translation.ja: 体を鍛えて強くなることだけじゃない

translation.en: It was also about sending a message.
translation.ja: メッセージを伝えていた

translation.en: [all] Good morning, Australia!
translation.ja: おはよう オーストラリア

translation.en: [Bertrand] Now it was only until we started to win races
translation.ja: レースに勝ち続けていくうちに

translation.en: that our credibility increased.
translation.ja: 確信を持ち始めた

translation.en: [news anchor 1] In the America's Cup preliminaries,
translation.ja: アメリカ杯の予選では

translation.en: all signs are pointing to Alan Bond's Australia II as the boat to beat.
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号が挑戦艇に決定しそうです

translation.en: [Bertrand] We beat the Italians, crushed the Canadians.
translation.ja: イタリア人カナダ人を負かした

translation.en: [news anchor 2] After today's race,

translation.en: it seems nothing can tack faster or point higher into the wind
translation.ja: 今日もベンの12メートル級艇より⸺ 速いタッキングと風上帆走する艇はありません

translation.en: than Ben Lexcen's radical 12 Metre.
translation.ja: 速いタッキングと風上帆走する艇はありません

translation.en: While few people have actually seen this mysterious keel,
translation.ja: 不思議なキールを見た人は少数ですが

translation.en: almost everyone here has seen the boat racing and winning.
translation.ja: 艇の走りと勝利は大勢が見ています

translation.en: [announcer] Australia II, by some…
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号は…

translation.en: Then, suddenly, "Why are they so competitive?"
translation.ja: 人々は疑問に思い始めた“速さの秘けつは？”

translation.en: [reporter 1] What is that beneath the hull of the Australia II?
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号の船底には何が？

translation.en: A keel, but what kind of a keel?
translation.ja: どんな種類のキールなのか？

translation.en: It's this summer's mystery at Newport.
translation.ja: ニューポートの今夏の謎です

translation.en: [Bertrand] The boat was covered. It was always secret.
translation.ja: 艇にカバーをかけ秘密を守ったが

translation.en: And that started to drive some of the observers crazy.
translation.ja: それが逆に 人々の興味を引いてしまった

translation.en: The big question here, Bryant, this morning, is what do the Aussies have on their bottom?
translation.ja: 今朝の最大の謎はオージーの船底の秘密だ

translation.en: [interviewer] Between us, can you tell me what that keel is?
translation.ja: ここだけの話どんなキールか教えて

translation.en: -Between us, Mort, I can't tell you, no. -[both laugh]
translation.ja: ここだけの話…言えないよ

translation.en: [reporter 2] Armed guards patrol this place around the clock.
translation.ja: 24時間の警備体制で

translation.en: the yacht that may very well succeed in making sporting history.
translation.ja: スポーツ史に残る優れたヨットです

translation.en: [reporter 3] Australia's designer, Ben Lexcen,

translation.en: he's something of a reluctant superstar here,
translation.ja: デザイナーのレクセンは口を閉ざしていますが デザイナーのレクセンは口を閉ざしていますが〝オズの魔法使い〞

translation.en: but they all want to know about his keel.
translation.ja: 〝オズの魔法使い〞キールについて聞かれます キールについて聞かれます

translation.en: -[crowd] Let's see the keel! -[reporter 4] Where's the keel, Benny?
translation.ja: キールが見たい

translation.en: Ben Lexcen decided that he'd draw up a sketch of the winged keel,

translation.en: and he made it totally different than what it really was.

translation.en: so Ben went over with this sheet of paper and put it on their photocopier.
translation.ja: そのスケッチを置いて外に出たんだ

translation.en: Comes flying back into the office ten minutes later and says, "Guys!"
translation.ja: そして10分後に戻って叫んだ “大変だ”

translation.en: "I've left… I've left a drawing of my keel in your photocopier."
translation.ja: “コピー機にキールの設計図を忘れた”

translation.en: By that afternoon, there were copies all over Newport of our fake keel.
translation.ja: 午後には ニューポート中に偽キールのコピーが出回った 午後には ニューポート中に偽キールのコピーが出回った 〝独占秘密のキールの設計図〞

translation.en: Then opposition boats put winglets on the bottom of their keels.
translation.ja: 〝独占秘密のキールの設計図〞 対戦相手たちはキールに翼をつけ始めた

translation.en: [reporter 5] Australia's keel has so impressed everyone
translation.ja: オーストラリアに影響され

translation.en: that the British have put wings on the keel of Victory.
translation.ja: イギリスもキールに翼をつけました

translation.en: We'd go around and check them and say, "No, it's little a bit different to that."
translation.ja: 我々は見て回っては “そこは違う”と指摘したよ

translation.en: "You gotta try and do it this way." You know? [laughs]
translation.ja: “そこは違う”と指摘したよ

translation.en: [man] One of the Americans drew that and says there's their design. That's their secret keel.
translation.ja: これはアメリカ人が書いた秘密のキールの設計図です

translation.en: Is that it? What do you think? Is that…
translation.ja: どうです？正しいですか？

translation.en: Could be. Could be.
translation.ja: そうかもね

translation.en: [announcer] Australia II has won!
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号の勝利

translation.en: The West Australians now have an incredible 45 wins from 51 starts,
translation.ja: 西オーストラリアは51試合中 なんと45勝です

translation.en: and that just happens to be the best record in 12 Metre history.
translation.ja: 12メートル級の歴史上最高記録となりました

translation.en: And in the end, we won the Challenger Series. We won by a lot.
translation.ja: 何勝もして ついに挑戦艇シリーズで勝った

translation.en: And so that's the boat race and the Challenge Series.
translation.ja: 挑戦艇シリーズの結果が出ました

translation.en: Australia goes on to race Liberty for the America's Cup.
translation.ja: オーストラリアがアメリカス･カップで リバティに挑みます

translation.en: The Australians are the official 25th challengers for the America's Cup,
translation.ja: 第25回アメリカス･カップにオーストラリアが挑みます

translation.en: and their incredible winning record really has the New York Yacht Club worried.
translation.ja: 彼らの連勝記録にＮＹＹＣは不安を隠せません

translation.en: [reporter] The man who won the Cup last time for the United States is jittery.
translation.ja: 前回のカップ防衛者は神経質になっています

translation.en: We don't know much about their boat. It's obviously a different, uh, type
translation.ja: 詳細は知らないが 彼らの艇は特殊な12メートル級らしい

translation.en: of, uh, characteristics than a standard 12 Metre.
translation.ja: 彼らの艇は特殊な12メートル級らしい

translation.en: It tacks differently, and it, uh, accelerates differently,
translation.ja: タッキングや加速の方法から

translation.en: and it maneuvers differently at the starts.
translation.ja: スタート時のマヌーバーも他と違う

translation.en: The New York Yacht Club saw that our race record was really strong.
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣは 我々の記録を脅威に感じていた

translation.en: -Hi. -[reporter] Two minutes for a--
translation.ja: ２分だけでも

translation.en: -No. Sorry. -[reporter] Not even two minutes?
translation.ja: いや　無理だ ２分も？

translation.en: We're late for a meeting here, so we gotta move on.
translation.ja: 会議に遅れそうで急いでる

translation.en: Thank you anyway.
translation.ja: すまないね

translation.en: [Bertrand] And if these Aussies are beating up on the foreign challengers so easily,
translation.ja: オーストラリア艇が他の外国艇に圧勝し⸺

translation.en: 47 wins out of 55 races,
translation.ja: 55レース中 47勝した

translation.en: then that starts to cut deep. That sent shock waves through the New York Yacht Club.
translation.ja: この事実が 痛手となってＮＹＹＣに衝撃が走った

translation.en: Clearly shock waves through Newport.
translation.ja: ニューポートの町にもだ

translation.en: [reporter 1] There's a serious side to this.
translation.ja: 深刻な状況です

translation.en: Obviously there's more than just a yachting race at stake. There's also a lot of money.
translation.ja: 勝敗だけでなく大金が懸かっているのです

translation.en: It's estimated that £100 million are spent in and around Newport during the America's Cup.
translation.ja: レース期間中 この町では１億ポンドが消費されます

translation.en: It was a sudden realization that they could lose this golden goose. It could really happen.
translation.ja: 金の卵を失いそうだと彼らは気づき始めた

translation.en: [man] People in Newport and Rhode Island knew all the time,
translation.ja: ニューポートにとって

translation.en: but kept it a very closely guarded secret that the prize isn't so much a sailboat race.
translation.ja: 優勝だけがレースの褒賞ではありません

translation.en: It's about a billion-dollar industry that goes along with the Cup.
translation.ja: アメリカ杯は10億ドル産業なのです

translation.en: [reporter 2] So if the Americans lose,
translation.ja: 〝アメリカス･カップ通り〞 アメリカが負ければ アメリカが負ければ

translation.en: then a substantial amount of that might be spent in Western Australia.
translation.ja: 莫大なお金が西オーストラリアに流れます

translation.en: [Bertrand] So, for the New York Yacht Club, the consequences of losing
translation.ja: アメリカ杯に負けた場合のＮＹＹＣの損失は⸺

translation.en: are enormous.
translation.ja: 計り知れない

translation.en: [announcer] An ABC News Brief brought to you by Apple Computer.
translation.ja: アップル社がお送りするＡＢＣニュース

translation.en: Now from Los Angeles, here's Peter Jennings.
translation.ja: ロサンゼルスのピーターです

translation.en: The America's Cup competition is set to get underway this Thursday.
translation.ja: 木曜日から始まるアメリカ杯について

translation.en: There is now a dispute, however, between the New York Yacht Club and the Australians.
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣが論争を巻き起こしています

translation.en: It seems the Americans are upset with something the Aussies have done with the underside of their boat,
translation.ja: オーストラリア人がヨットの下につけた物は

translation.en: something the Americans feel will give the Aussies an unfair advantage.
translation.ja: 不正であると訴えているのです

translation.en: The New York Yacht Club alleges that Australia II's winged keel is illegal.
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣはウィングキールは違法だと申し立てました

translation.en: This four-million-dollar challenge,
translation.ja: 400万ドルの挑戦が

translation.en: the closest ever in the history of the Cup, could be scuttled.
translation.ja: カップを目前に消えようとしています

translation.en: [Longley] The New York Yacht Club, they wanted to ban us.
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣは我々を失格にするため

translation.en: They said there is no way that Benny could've come up with this. It had to have been designed by other people.
translation.ja: キールの発案者はベンではないと言い出した

translation.en: People couldn't believe that he could do it,
translation.ja: ベンにできるはずがないと決めつけたんだ

translation.en: given his education and his background.
translation.ja: 彼の学歴や職歴からね

translation.en: [reporter 1] At the center of all the fuss this year has been barefoot Ben Lexcen.
translation.ja: 今年の騒ぎの中心人物裸足のベン･レクセンです

translation.en: With three years' schooling,
translation.ja: ３年の学校教育のみで

translation.en: he's the man who has designed, arguably, the fastest 12 Metre ever.
translation.ja: 最速と言われる12メートル級を設計しました

translation.en: [Conner] I didn't know much about Ben Lexcen.
translation.ja: ベンはよく知らないが

translation.en: But people talk. You hear through the grapevine.
translation.ja: 人々のうわさは聞こえてきた

translation.en: Who's to say these wings, whose idea these really were?
translation.ja: キールの本当の発案者は誰なのかと

translation.en: [reporter 2] The Americans try and confirm that Lexcen was helped by Dutch designers.
translation.ja: オランダの協力があったとアメリカ人は主張します

translation.en: [Conner] We believe Lexcen used the idea from Amsterdam,
translation.ja: アムステルダムで開発したのなら⸺ アムステルダムで開発したのなら⸺ 〝オランダとオーストラリアの発明〞

translation.en: but the rules are it had to be designed by the country of the challenge.
translation.ja: 〝オランダとオーストラリアの発明〞 設計から挑戦国で行うというルールに違反する 設計から挑戦国で行うというルールに違反する

translation.en: The New York Yacht Club believe they have grounds to say that I didn't design the boat totally by myself.
translation.ja: 僕だけのデザインではないとＮＹＹＣは証明するつもりだ

translation.en: They go behind your back and try and get evidence in dubious ways.
translation.ja: 汚い手を使って裏で証拠を集めようとしてる

translation.en: [reporter 3] This afternoon, Ben was suffering what friends said were a couple of dizzy spells.
translation.ja: 友人の話では 今日の午後ベンはめまいに襲われ

translation.en: Doctors immediately put him into intensive care.
translation.ja: 集中治療室へ入りました

translation.en: His friends say it's the attacks against his name
translation.ja: 〝ニューポート病院〞 発作の原因は彼への中傷だと友人は主張します 発作の原因は彼への中傷だと友人は主張します

translation.en: that helped put him there.
translation.ja: 発作の原因は彼への中傷だと友人は主張します

translation.en: [Bertrand] The New York Yacht Club were endeavoring to get the design assistants in Holland
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣは オランダのデザイン助手を味方につけ

translation.en: to say that they designed the keel and not Ben Lexcen.
translation.ja: 彼らの設計だと証明しようとした

translation.en: The Dutch had designed the keel and not Ben Lexcen.
translation.ja: レクセンのデザインではありません レクセンのデザインではありませんＮＹＹＣ会長

translation.en: We felt responsible to go over,
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣ会長オランダに人を派遣し⸺ オランダに人を派遣し⸺

translation.en: to send someone to Holland to really investigate it.
translation.ja: 調査するのが我々の義務です

translation.en: [reporter] The director of the Netherlands Ship Model Basin has charged
translation.ja: シップ･モデル研究所の所長は

translation.en: that members of the New York Yacht Club tried to get him to sign a false affidavit
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣの会員から偽証を迫られたと訴えました

translation.en: stating Ben Lexcen was not the designer.
translation.ja: ベンのデザインではないという内容です

translation.en: [Van Oossanen] I was very surprised to come face-to-face with two people
translation.ja: ２人の会員がやって来て私に署名させようとした

translation.en: who wanted me to sign a document
translation.ja: ２人の会員がやって来て私に署名させようとした 録音音声

translation.en: which said that I was the designer of Australia II rather than Ben Lexcen,
translation.ja: 私がオーストラリア２号を設計したなんて ピーター･ファン･オーサネン

translation.en: which is almost too ridiculous to even think of.
translation.ja: ピーター･ファン･オーサネン 全くあり得ない話だ 全くあり得ない話だ 全くあり得ない話だ オランダ人デザイナー

translation.en: The keel cup committee said, "We've been over to Holland,
translation.ja: 委員会は オランダまで調査に行ったが

translation.en: and there was no substance to their complaint."
translation.ja: 申し立てに該当する事実はなかった

translation.en: "This boat is fair and legal."
translation.ja: 公正な艇だと証明され⸺

translation.en: And that was the thing that finally busted their case apart.
translation.ja: 彼らの主張は打ち砕かれた

translation.en: The New York Yacht Club today withdrew its objections
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣは本日 ウィングキールに対する申し立てを取り下げました

translation.en: to the mysterious winged keel on Australia II
translation.ja: ウィングキールに対する申し立てを取り下げました

translation.en: and said, "May the better yacht win the America's Cup."
translation.ja: “優れたヨットが勝つ”と言っています

translation.en: [Bond] It has been 56 races and nearly two and a half years of effort
translation.ja: 56レースと約２年半にわたる努力により

translation.en: been put in to reach where we are today.
translation.ja: 私たちはここに到達しました

translation.en: Let the best yacht and crew decide by the gun at the end of each race.
translation.ja: 各レースの最後に決まるのは最高のヨットとクルーです

translation.en: [man] We're about to go live by satellite to Newport. Rob Mundle, are you there?
translation.ja: ニューポートから生放送でお届けします

translation.en: [Mundle] Certainly. Good morning, Harry. We have a great battle coming up.
translation.ja: おはよう最大の戦いが始まります

translation.en: The showdown, 132 years of sporting history at stake here.
translation.ja: 132年の連勝記録の行方が決まります

translation.en: We're looking at Dennis Conner on the screen right there.
translation.ja: デニス･コナーの登場です

translation.en: [Conner] I was uneasy.
translation.ja: 不安だった

translation.en: Bertrand, he was at the top of his game.
translation.ja: レースを制してきたバートランドには⸺

translation.en: He was a tough competitor, and he had a very good boat and a good crew.
translation.ja: 素晴らしいヨットがあり優秀なクルーがいる

translation.en: He was dangerous, and he scared me.
translation.ja: 彼の強さを脅威に感じた

translation.en: [reporter] Liberty and Australia II have entered the race course.
translation.ja: ２艇がレースコースに入り

translation.en: According to my watch, nine minutes and 30 seconds from now, they will cross the starting line.
translation.ja: あと９分30秒後にはレース開始となります

translation.en: [Lissiman] Ten minutes before the start of the race gun, that's when the two boats would meet,
translation.ja: 試合開始の銃声の10分前２艇は顔を合わせた

translation.en: positioning yourself, and that's when it'd be on. The gloves would come off.
translation.ja: スタート位置を確保しいよいよ決戦の始まりだ

translation.en: The yacht that had got to the first mark of the first race
translation.ja: 第１レースで最初にマークを回ったヨットが

translation.en: had always won the America's Cup.
translation.ja: いつも優勝してきた

translation.en: [reporter] Australia over the line first by three seconds.
translation.ja: オーストラリアが３秒早いスタートを切った

translation.en: And I look behind, and Dennis is right on our hammer, right on our hammer.
translation.ja: 振り返るとすぐ後ろにデニスがいた

translation.en: [commentator] The two yachts are now approaching the first marker,
translation.ja: ２艇は 第１マークに近づきます

translation.en: and it's good news for Australia.
translation.ja: オーストラリアが先行

translation.en: [Longley] We just beat them by a couple of boat lengths. One to us. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 我々が先に回って優位に立った

translation.en: [reporter] Australia has just made history.
translation.ja: オーストラリアが歴史を変えました

translation.en: The foreign challenger has never reached the first mark
translation.ja: 挑戦艇がアメリカ艇より先に⸺

translation.en: ahead of the American boat in the first race.
translation.ja: 第１マークを越えたのは初めてです

translation.en: Australia has just done it.
translation.ja: オーストラリアが実現しました

translation.en: [Bertrand] After the start, we sailed away from Liberty.
translation.ja: そのままリバティを引き離した

translation.en: Then all of a sudden, it was like an explosion.
translation.ja: すると突然爆発音が聞こえたんだ

translation.en: [Bertrand] We had no control at all.
translation.ja: コントロールを失い

translation.en: The wheel just went light. No steering. Just rudderless.
translation.ja: 舵取りが全くできず方向が定まらない

translation.en: [Simmer] It was weird. We just had a fitting pull off the side of the boat
translation.ja: 何かがおかしく艇は横向きになり

translation.en: that had been there forever, you know.
translation.ja: 元に戻れない気がした

translation.en: And Dennis passed around us.
translation.ja: デニスが我々を抜いていき

translation.en: The race was over.
translation.ja: レースは終了した

translation.en: [Tom Brokaw] Liberty wins.
translation.ja: リバティの勝利です

translation.en: Sounds like a World War I poster, but it is instead the headline
translation.ja: 第一次大戦のポスターのようですが

translation.en: out of today's opening round of the America's Cup.
translation.ja: アメリカス･カップの見出しです 〝リバティがオーストラリアに勝つ〞

translation.en: We went across his stern, and the damn rudder broke.
translation.ja: 相手の船尾をクロスした時舵が壊れた

translation.en: [Longley] And then, of course, start of the second race,
translation.ja: 第２レースの開始時には

translation.en: bang, one of the tangs holding the headboard of the mainsail breaks.
translation.ja: セールのヘッドボードを支えるタングが壊れた

translation.en: [reporter] All summer their boat broke down just once,
translation.ja: 夏の間は１度でしたが⸺

translation.en: and now in the finals, two races and two breakdowns.
translation.ja: 決戦の２レースで２度も故障しました

translation.en: This has meant a lot to the Liberty crew, giving them momentum
translation.ja: リバティのクルーは勢いに乗り

translation.en: and an awful lot of confidence heading into race three.
translation.ja: 第３レースも自信満々のようです

translation.en: [journalist] Commodore McCullough, what would you say the odds are right now?
translation.ja: 勝率についてどのように予想されますか？

translation.en: I think we'll win it 4-0, but I'll take four-to-one as a safety factor. [laughs]
translation.ja: ４勝０敗だろうねでも４勝１敗と言っておくよ

translation.en: [man] Any further questions?
translation.ja: 他にご質問は？

translation.en: For something like that to happen two races in a row,
translation.ja: ２レース連続で事故が起きるなんて

translation.en: it's just unforgivable.
translation.ja: 許せなかった

translation.en: Benny, give me a break, just give me something that'll allow us to play the game here.
translation.ja: 私はベンに“どうにかして解決してくれ”と伝えた

translation.en: [Lissiman] When we had that breakage,
translation.ja: 故障が起きて

translation.en: there was some tension with John Bertrand and Ben Lexcen.
translation.ja: ジョンとベンの間に緊張が走った

translation.en: And I remember John saying to him,
translation.ja: ジョンの言葉を覚えてるよ

translation.en: "Go through the boat from head to toe and just check everything."
translation.ja: “徹底的に艇を見て回り全て確認しろ”とね

translation.en: [reporter] They have now gone over the yacht
translation.ja: 彼らは 船首から船尾マストからキールまで

translation.en: from bow to stern, from masthead to keel bolt,
translation.ja: 彼らは 船首から船尾マストからキールまで 彼らは 船首から船尾マストからキールまで 第３レース

translation.en: checking every sail, every piece of equipment.
translation.ja: 第３レース セールや艤装を全て点検しています セールや艤装を全て点検しています

translation.en: Race three, Benny didn't attend the launching of the boat.
translation.ja: 第３レースではベンは艇から離れて

translation.en: He was actually on a hill with binoculars
translation.ja: 丘で双眼鏡を覗いていた

translation.en: under intense pressure.
translation.ja: 相当な重圧だ

translation.en: With just about seven minutes to go now to get this race underway.
translation.ja: レース開始まであと７分です レース開始まであと７分です〝第３レース〞

translation.en: [announcer 1] You are watching Australia II,
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号は

translation.en: the 12 Metre that has set the yachting world on its ear.
translation.ja: 12メートル級の常識を覆しました

translation.en: [race official] Three, two, one.
[announcer 2] Australia II has just passed Liberty
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号はリバティを抜き

translation.en: and is taking off down the course.
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号はリバティを抜き コースを進みます

translation.en: But as it turns out, it was Benny's dream in its finest hour.
translation.ja: 結果的に⸺ ベンの夢がかなう最高の時間となった

translation.en: [announcer 3] We have just reached the three-hour mark of this race,
translation.ja: レースは まもなく３時間を越えます

translation.en: and the winds here in Newport are starting to pick up.
translation.ja: ニューポートは風が強くなってきました

translation.en: [Lissiman] Quite often in Newport, the wind speed was very strong,
translation.ja: ニューポートは風速の強い日が多い場所だ

translation.en: and the winged keel effectively lowered the center of gravity of the yacht
translation.ja: ウィングキールがヨットの重心を押し下げ

translation.en: and made Australia II competitive in stronger breezes.
translation.ja: 艇は強風でも競争力を発揮した 〝重力の中心〞 艇は強風でも競争力を発揮した

translation.en: This concept, upwind, the boat was a rocket ship.
translation.ja: 狙いどおりまるでロケットだ

translation.en: She was seriously fast.
translation.ja: ものすごい速さだ

translation.en: [reporter] Australia sailed across the line
translation.ja: オーストラリアが３分14秒の差で

translation.en: to win the third race by three minutes and 14 seconds.
translation.ja: オーストラリアが３分14秒の差で 第３レースを制しました

translation.en: Since 12 Metre started racing for the America's Cup,
translation.ja: アメリカス･カップの12メートル級レース史上

translation.en: that's the biggest margin ever recorded by a challenger.
translation.ja: 挑戦艇が記録した最大の時間差です

translation.en: [commentator] Australia II is exceptionally fast.
translation.ja: この挑戦艇の驚異的な速さは

translation.en: This is what the New York Yacht Club is afraid of.
translation.ja: まさにＮＹＹＣが恐れていたものです

translation.en: [Conner] The New York Yacht Club certainly didn't have any enthusiasm from my performance.
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣは明らかに私の働きに不満を抱いていた

translation.en: [interviewer] Is the New York Yacht Club at all embarrassed about this?
translation.ja: ＮＹＹＣは屈辱を感じていますか？

translation.en: [Commodore] We keep the pressure on the skippers
translation.ja: スキッパーには⸺

translation.en: because we say their head replaces the Cup in the New York Yacht Club,
translation.ja: カップの代わりに生首を飾ると言ってある

translation.en: so we keep pressure on them all the time. [laughs]
translation.ja: 常にプレッシャーをかけているよ

translation.en: [Conner] But I came in after losing that race, I wasn't ready just to lay down and quit. No.
translation.ja: 第３レースに負けても諦める気なんて全くなかった

translation.en: The biggest thing to me was the attitude. Attitude, attitude, attitude.
translation.ja: 私にって最も大事なのは戦いに挑む姿勢だ

translation.en: Tired of the bullshit.
translation.ja: 遊びは終わりだ

translation.en: Tired of wasting four hours every morning fucking around for something that's not gonna help us win the Cup.
translation.ja: 優勝に結びつかない朝の４時間を過ごす気はない

translation.en: All I was focused on was being the best I could be.
translation.ja: 全力を尽くすことに注力した

translation.en: No excuse to lose.
translation.ja: 敗北に言い訳はない

translation.en: [announcer] Look at this.
translation.ja: 第４レース 第４レース 先頭を走るのはリバティです

translation.en: The boat at the top of the screen is Liberty.
translation.ja: 先頭を走るのはリバティです

translation.en: Six seconds ahead of Australia when the gun fired.
translation.ja: スタートから６秒先行しています

translation.en: [commentator 1] Liberty went around the first mark 36 seconds ahead.
translation.ja: リバティは36秒 先行して第１マークを回りました

translation.en: [Bertrand] Dennis Conner was unstoppable.
translation.ja: デニス･コナーは止まらない

translation.en: [Simmer] He was the most cunning and clever on the water and strategically made good moves.
translation.ja: 彼は水上で 賢く立ち回り戦略的に艇を操舵する

translation.en: [commentator 2] We get into a classic tacking duel.
translation.ja: タッキング勝負に入った

translation.en: He was impossible to go around, always covering tack for tack.
translation.ja: タッキングを繰り返しても彼を抜けなかった

translation.en: And he was hitting the wind shifts at the right time, massive wind shifts.
translation.ja: 激しく変わる風向きの変化を彼は適切に捉えた

translation.en: [commentator 3] Liberty led Australia across the finish line by 43 seconds.
translation.ja: リバティがオーストラリアを43秒引き離しゴール

translation.en: [commentator 4] There she goes. She's shooting it. There's the gun. This race is over.
translation.ja: リバティが来ました銃声がして レース終了です

translation.en: The Americans lead three to one.
translation.ja: アメリカが３勝です

translation.en: I kicked butt.
translation.ja: 見返してやった

translation.en: The American yacht Liberty tonight is just one victory away
translation.ja: アメリカのリバティはあと１勝で

translation.en: from keeping the America's Cup in the United States.
translation.ja: アメリカス･カップを守れます

translation.en: Three to one in the America's Cup series. One more win for Liberty,

translation.en: and the America's Cup will stay bolted down at the New York Yacht Club.
translation.ja: アメリカス･カップのボルトは外されません

translation.en: [reporter] The despondent Australians return to their dock,
translation.ja: 失意のオーストラリア人は

translation.en: knowing they're down 3-1. They cannot afford to make any more errors.
translation.ja: ３敗となった今二度と失敗はできません

translation.en: [Bertrand] At 3-1 in Newport, the champagne was on ice,
translation.ja: ニューポートの人々は３勝を祝うシャンパンを開け

translation.en: the banners were ready to go up. "Congratulations, Dennis and team."
translation.ja: “おめでとう デニス”という垂れ幕も用意していた

translation.en: And Newport was about to celebrate.
translation.ja: お祝いムードだった

translation.en: [Longley] It's all over. Absolutely. It's all over.
translation.ja: 終わったよ　完全に終わった

translation.en: Newport was rocking.
translation.ja: 現地は浮かれていてこの上なく幸せそうだった

translation.en: They just couldn't have been happier to have another thrashing.
translation.ja: 現地は浮かれていてこの上なく幸せそうだった 次も楽勝だとね

translation.en: It was just demoralizing.
translation.ja: すっかり自信をなくした

translation.en: [Bertrand] On the morning of the race, I remember the breakfast was subdued.
translation.ja: レースの日は朝から重い空気が漂っていた

translation.en: I had a hard time even smelling the bacon and eggs, let alone eating anything.
translation.ja: 朝食のにおいも耐えられず何ものどを通らない

translation.en: But then, on the television, we received a note
translation.ja: 突然 テレビから ボブ･ホーク首相のメッセージが流れてきた

translation.en: from the Prime Minister of Australia, Bob Hawke.
translation.ja: ボブ･ホーク首相のメッセージが流れてきた

translation.en: Congratulations, you've done a magnificent job to this point.
translation.ja: 君たちのこれまでの働きをたたえたい

translation.en: What you've shown in relation to our technological capacity,
translation.ja: 我が国の技術力を証明してくれたうえに

translation.en: our determination as individuals…
translation.ja: 個人の意思の強さを示してくれた

translation.en: You've got the entire support of Australia.
translation.ja: 我々は 国を挙げて君たちを応援する

translation.en: We'll all be looking forward to your return
translation.ja: 君たちが偉業を成し遂げ

translation.en: when we will do you as proud as you have done us.
translation.ja: 帰国するのを心待ちにしている

translation.en: [Simmer] Bob Hawke, Prime Minister of Australia,
translation.ja: オーストラリアの首相だ

translation.en: shit, that's a big deal.
translation.ja: すごいことだよ

translation.en: [Bertrand] Here we were being recognized by the prime minister of our nation.
translation.ja: 自国の首相に認められたという事実が

translation.en: It was a total game changer.
translation.ja: 転機になった

translation.en: Armies over the last thousand years have gone to war with symbols and music.
translation.ja: 1000年以上前から軍隊は⸺ シンボルと音楽で戦場に送り出された

translation.en: So, the boxing kangaroo flag was raised.

translation.en: And we chose a battle hymn, Men at Work, "Down Under."

translation.en: And the team spirit came alive.
translation.ja: チームに活気が戻った

translation.en: [announcer] And so almost unbelievably, that's Australia ahead at the first mark.
translation.ja: オーストラリアが先に第１マークを回りました

translation.en: Off the coast of Rhode Island, it was Australia's day.
translation.ja: 今日はオーストラリアの日となりました

translation.en: And Australia II still is alive and in the America's Cup yacht race.
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号の挑戦は続きます

translation.en: We're just gonna get out there and do it twice more, get this Cup for Australia.
translation.ja: あと２勝して カップをオーストラリアに持ち帰る

translation.en: [Bertrand] At three to two, the tables were turning.
translation.ja: ３対２となったので逆転もあり得る

translation.en: Television crews were coming in from all around the world.
translation.ja: 世界中からテレビ局がやって来て

translation.en: Australians were flying in to Newport.
translation.ja: オーストラリア人も現地に来た

translation.en: Tonight, that quaint coastal resort of Newport, Rhode Island,
translation.ja: 古い海辺町のニューポートは今夜⸺

translation.en: is under the constant barrage of Australia II.
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号に圧倒されています

translation.en: The whole of Newport knew that the Australians were in town.

translation.en: We tore the place apart. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 町を二分したんだ

translation.en: [man] The Aussies certainly have joined the hype and hoopla here with gusto,

translation.en: promoting their souvenirs and image aggressively.
translation.ja: 積極的に自国をアピールしています

translation.en: The barbarians are at the gate.
translation.ja: 〝集まれ オージー〞外国人の襲来です 外国人の襲来です

translation.en: The Australians have come for the sacred Cup,
translation.ja: 〝奪いに来たぜ〞オーストラリア人は聖杯を奪おうと

translation.en: and they're howling.
translation.ja: ほえています

translation.en: What Australians really like is upsetting the upper echelon.
translation.ja: オーストラリア人は本当に⸺ 上流階級の人間をあおるのが好きだ

translation.en: In race six, we were sailing the boat extremely well.
translation.ja: 第６レースは快調に飛ばした

translation.en: The boat was a rocket ship.
translation.ja: ロケットだ

translation.en: It's Australia II with a very big lead here by some two minutes, it seems.
translation.ja: オーストラリア２号は大幅に先行し 現在 ２分の差です

translation.en: [Longley] And we won that race by three and a half minutes.
translation.ja: ３分半の大差で勝った

translation.en: It was the greatest win by a challenging yacht in the 12 Metre era.
translation.ja: 12メートル級の挑戦艇として見事な成績だ

translation.en: [Jennings] In 132 years, no challenger has ever driven the races
translation.ja: 132年の歴史上 最大の７レースが行われるのは初めてです

translation.en: to the full best-of-seven series.
translation.ja: 最大の７レースが行われるのは初めてです

translation.en: The Australians, dare we say it, humiliated the Americans.
translation.ja: オーストラリア人はアメリカ人に屈辱を与えた

translation.en: So now it's three apiece. One race to go, a true world series.
translation.ja: 両国ともに３勝となり決死の戦いが始まります

translation.en: -We can do it, Jim. We can do it. -Oh yeah.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ俺たちならできる

translation.en: [Bertrand] The score went from 3-1 to 3-2 to 3-3.
translation.ja: 我々は ３対１から３対３へ追い上げた

translation.en: The Aussies had arrived.
translation.ja: オージーが本領発揮だ

translation.en: [man] How does it feel being the first in 132 years, which is a very long time,

translation.en: to be in this situation of three-all?

translation.en: I mean, it must concern you.
translation.ja: 初の３対３となりました 不安もあるでしょう

translation.en: It's gonna be very exciting to be involved in the race of the century.
translation.ja: 世紀のレースに関われてとても興奮しています

translation.en: We're hoping that, uh, we can find a way to prevail

translation.en: like we have in, over the last 132 years. I think we have an awful lot of tradition going for us,

translation.en: and, uh, somehow, I think we'll pull it out on Saturday.

translation.en: [Bertrand] Dennis was in a super high-pressure environment.

translation.en: And the bottom line is the New York Yacht Club

translation.en: were never in the business of losing, literally, by any means.
translation.ja: 何があっても負けることは想定していない

translation.en: Panic, pure and simple, has gripped the American camp.
translation.ja: アメリカのチームをパニックが襲います

translation.en: Shaken by Australia II's effortless win in the sixth race,
translation.ja: 第６レースで惨敗したリバティのシンジケートは

translation.en: the Liberty syndicate are resorting to truly desperate measures.
translation.ja: 第６レースで惨敗したリバティのシンジケートは 必死の抵抗を試みます

translation.en: Today the New York Yacht Club just couldn't resist firing one more shot.

translation.en: [Bertrand] Dennis and the team found a loophole in the rule on the 11th hour

translation.en: and made major changes in Liberty.
translation.ja: リバティの艇体を改造した

translation.en: so that 1,000 pounds of her ballast could be removed.

translation.en: [Simmer] It had never happened before. But the New York Yacht Club allowed them to do it.

translation.en: Would never have happened if we wanted to reconfigure our boat.

translation.en: [Conner] Like NASCAR, there are rules in NASCAR,

translation.en: but there's-- Rules are broken, and they win the race.
translation.ja: ＮＡＳＣＡＲ(カーレース)と同じでルールはあっても 勝つために変えることもある

translation.en: You use the rules to your advantage to take advantage of the other competition.
translation.ja: ルールを逆手にとって競技を有利に運ぶ

translation.en: No excuse to lose.
translation.ja: 敗北に言い訳はない

translation.en: Alan and the crew, the exercise in which you're about to engage
translation.ja: 第７レースアランとクルーがこれから成す偉業は アランとクルーがこれから成す偉業は アランとクルーがこれから成す偉業はボブ･ホークオーストラリア首相

translation.en: is certainly one of the historic moments in Australian sporting history.
translation.ja: ボブ･ホークオーストラリア首相間違いなく 我が国のスポーツ史に刻まれる 間違いなく 我が国のスポーツ史に刻まれる

translation.en: You have all our best wishes with you.
translation.ja: 国民は皆君たちを応援している

translation.en: If it gets tight, let us know, and we'll all turn towards Newport and blow to get you home.

translation.en: We're with you. The very, very best of luck.
translation.ja: 心は共にある　頑張ってくれ 心は共にある　頑張ってくれ ボブ･ホークオーストラリア首相

translation.en: No one had ever won it from the Americans.
translation.ja: ボブ･ホークオーストラリア首相 今までアメリカ人に勝った者はいない 今までアメリカ人に勝った者はいない

translation.en: So here was history, absolute history in the making.
translation.ja: 新しい歴史が作られたんだ

translation.en: Always good to beat the Americans. At anything. [chuckles]

translation.en: [man over PA] We're with you, Australia II!
translation.ja: 心は共にあるオーストラリア２号

translation.en: We're with you, Australia II!
translation.ja: 〝心は共にあるオーストラリア２号〞

translation.en: [announcer] It's the premier sailing event in the world.

translation.en: It's the cup that's never been lost.

translation.en: It's the race that may end the longest winning tradition in international sports history.

translation.en: the final race for the America's Cup.

translation.en: [Mundle] Good morning, the world.
translation.ja: 〝ＡＢＣ世界のスポーツニュース〞 〝ＡＢＣ世界のスポーツニュース〞おはよう 皆さん生放送でお届けします

translation.en: Once again, another live telecast
translation.ja: おはよう 皆さん生放送でお届けします

translation.en: to Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, America and Europe.

translation.en: At the moment, we have about 30 million people watching.
translation.ja: 世界中の３０００万人がテレビに釘づけです

translation.en: [reporter] It's an emotional morning for Mrs. Beryl Bertrand,

translation.ja: 息子のアメリカス･カップ最終レースを見守ります

translation.en: Today they sail the winner-take-all, do-or-die, there's-no-tomorrow race.

translation.en: The envelope of people around us was like a pressure cooker.

translation.en: We're lining up now for the start of the seventh and vital race

translation.en: in this America's Cup.
translation.ja: アメリカス･カップ勝敗を決する第７レースです

translation.en: [Bertrand] This is thousands of hours of preparation, a lifetime of preparation.
translation.ja: 人生を懸けて何千時間もの準備を重ね

translation.en: And I'd visualized this space. I'd visualized this time.
translation.ja: この瞬間を何度もイメージしていた

translation.en: I said to the team,
translation.ja: 皆に想像させた

translation.en: "Visualize you're on the back of an eagle, a thousand feet in the air."
translation.ja: “ワシに乗って300メートル上空に昇れ”

translation.en: "And you see the boat going through the water."
translation.ja: “海に浮かぶ艇が見える”

translation.en: So I said, "Reach down with big scissors and cut the distractions,
translation.ja: “艇へ下り 大きなハサミで雑念を切って”

translation.en: release the boat, release ourselves."
translation.ja: “艇と自分を解き放て”

translation.en: "There's no tomorrow, there's no yesterday, and there's no future."
translation.ja: “明日も昨日もそして未来もない”

translation.en: It was just today.
translation.ja: “あるのは今日だけ”

translation.en: [commentator 1] Five seconds away from the start.
translation.ja: スタート５秒前

translation.en: -[gun fires] -[commentator 1] There's the starting gun.
translation.ja: スタートの銃声

translation.en: When the gun went off, the two boats charged at each other.
translation.ja: スタート後２艇はそれぞれ快走した

translation.en: Here we go, you know. This is gonna be on.
translation.ja: 勝負の始まりだ

translation.en: [commentator 2] They are neck-and-neck at the moment.
translation.ja: ほぼ互角の速さです

translation.en: John Bertrand has now turned towards Liberty.
translation.ja: ジョンの艇がリバティに向いた

translation.en: We actually had a good start, and when we tacked, we were in front.
translation.ja: スタートは快調でタックして前に出た

translation.en: [commentator 3] Australia's gone right on top of Liberty
translation.ja: オーストラリアが２艇分ほど前に出ました

translation.en: by about two boat lengths.
translation.ja: オーストラリアが２艇分ほど前に出ましたオーストラリアシドニー オーストラリアシドニー

translation.en: Both boats on starboard tack.
translation.ja: オーストラリアシドニースターボードタックです

translation.en: [commentator 4] Uh-oh! It looks like John Bertrand has decided not to cover Dennis Conner.
translation.ja: ジョンはデニスをカバーしないようです

translation.en: [Longley] But Dennis gets in front
translation.ja: デニスが前に出て⸺

translation.en: and, quite frankly, starts to sail away from us.
translation.ja: ぐんぐんと我々を引き離した

translation.en: It became clear that Liberty was actually a faster boat than what we'd seen before.
translation.ja: リバティは 今までよりも明らかに速くなっていた

translation.en: The boat had been revved up.
translation.ja: 最速だった

translation.en: [Mundle] The boat is gaining maximum speed moving very nicely through the water there.
translation.ja: 艇は最高速度に達しスムーズに水中を進みます

translation.en: [commentator 5] She certainly looks like a different boat and obviously she's sailing like a different boat today.
translation.ja: 昨日とはまるで別の艇のようです

translation.en: [commentator 6] You can see the two yachts are now approaching the first marker,
translation.ja: ２艇のヨットはマークに近づきますが

translation.en: and it's not good news for Australia.
translation.ja: オーストラリア劣勢です

translation.en: [Mundle] Liberty is leading by 29 seconds at the first mark.
translation.ja: リバティが29秒早く第１マークを回りました

translation.en: [commentator 6] That failure by John Bertrand to recover could be tragic.
translation.ja: ジョンのミスが悲劇を生むかもしれません

translation.en: We did everything we could, but they just went faster.
translation.ja: 全力は尽くしていたが彼らは速かった

translation.en: [news anchor] If you're just joining us, it has been Liberty all the way.

translation.en: At the second mark, it was Liberty by 45. At the third mark, Liberty by 23.
translation.ja: 第２マークで45秒第３マークで23秒の差です

translation.en: [Bertrand] They just swept away from us. Close to a minute in front of us.
translation.ja: 我々は引き離され１分も差がついた

translation.en: We just couldn't believe it.
translation.ja: 信じられない

translation.en: [Mundle] We're just watching Liberty having rounded the fourth mark on the course,
translation.ja: リバティが第４マークを回ったところで

translation.en: the margin around 55 seconds, Bob.
translation.ja: 55秒差をつけています

translation.en: The Cup is as good as lost.
translation.ja: カップが遠のきます

translation.en: It seems that Bertrand's errors early in the race
translation.ja: レース序盤のジョンのミスが影響し

translation.en: may have cost Australia II the America's Cup.
translation.ja: オーストラリアはカップを逃しそうです

translation.en: To get 58 seconds ahead, that…
translation.ja: 58秒差をつけられた

translation.en: that's a long way.
translation.ja: かなりの差だ

translation.en: Four thousand people gathered outside
translation.ja: 外には4000人が集まり

translation.en: the Royal Perth Yacht Club in Western Australia,
translation.ja: 西オーストラリアのヨットクラブは満員です

translation.en: watching our live pictures and, uh, similar scenes over in Sydney.
translation.ja: 西オーストラリアのヨットクラブは満員です シドニーの人々も見守っています

translation.en: [announcer] It appears Liberty has a healthy lead at this point.
translation.ja: リバティが順調にリードし

translation.en: It's a race Dennis Conner cannot lose.
translation.ja: デニスは防衛に成功しそうです

translation.en: [reporter] The tension mounts at the Bertrand household.
translation.ja: バートランド家は緊張に包まれ

translation.en: Mrs. Bertrand experiences the agony
translation.ja: 夫人もつらそうです

translation.en: of watching The Wonder from Down Under fall behind the American yacht, Liberty.
translation.ja: 地球の裏側で息子が敗れる姿は見たくありません

translation.en: And, gentlemen, this downwind run is possibly our last hope.
translation.ja: 追い風のレグが最後の希望となりますね

translation.en: [Bertrand] They were basically gone.
translation.ja: 彼らは視界から消えた

translation.en: But the bottom line is, if the opposition start to believe that the competition
translation.ja: だが 我々の艤装の方が優れていると⸺

translation.en: and the equipment that they're using is superior,
translation.ja: 今まで相手に思わせてきた

translation.en: and you can't do anything about it 'cause it's secret,
translation.ja: しかも秘密だから太刀打ちできないと

translation.en: that becomes, psychologically, a big hurdle to overcome.

translation.en: We're such a small nation going against such large odds.

translation.en: of the people of Australia and all the guys.
